üí∏ Cost Tracking in LangSmith üí∏

Looking for deeper insights into your spending patterns for your LLM application to avoid costly surprises?

item.title: Self-Reflective RAG using LangGraph Self-reflection can enhance RAG, enabling correction of poor quality retrieval or generations. Several recent pape...
item.description:
Self-Reflective RAG using LangGraph

Self-reflection can enhance RAG, enabling correction of poor quality retrieval or generations.

Several recent papers focus on this theme, but implementing the ideas can be tricky.

Here is a video and two cookbooks that show how to engineer‚Ä¶

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇTomaz Bratanic
Got the first version of using Mixtral via @ollama to power a @LangChainAI agent that interacts with @neo4j via a semantic layer. I'll make it into a LangChain template and write a blog about it. You can take a sneak peek here: https://github.com/tomasonjo/blogs/blob/master/llm/ollama_semantic_layer.ipynb

item.description:
RAG From Scratch: Video series focused on understanding the RAG landscape

RAG is central for LLM application development, connecting LLMs to external data sources.

But, the pace of innovation and new approaches makes it challenging to keep up.

We're launching a new video‚Ä¶

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: ü§Ø I was astonished that you could run @nomic_ai's new OSS embeddings *in your browser* with @xenovacom's Transformers.js! If you want...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
ü§Ø I was astonished that you could run @nomic_ai's new OSS embeddings *in your browser* with @xenovacom's Transformers.js!

If you want to play with them, I updated my @ollama + @LangChainAI + @dawchihliou Voy fully-local chat with PDF app to use it:

https://github.com/jacoblee93/fully-local-pdf-chatbot


Xenova:‚ÄÇNomic Embed is out: a new 8K text embedding model by @nomic_ai! üöÄ

It's also compatible with ü§ó Transformers.js, meaning you can generate embeddings directly in your browser (no server required)!
